replies.msg: 聽即刻解釋番比外國人知 話我地比黑幫無差別打人斬人 先會咁大反應 叫佢地想像下佢地既家人行行下街無啦啦比一大班人打就會明

Many of us were beaten up brutally by the police and the mob, one of us lost an eye as a result of a gunshot wound. Yes, in Hong Kong, mob gangster and the police are working together out of one goal — to silence the people from protesting tor justice and freedom. Save Hong Kong! Free Hong Kong!

香港警察叫雞唔俾錢, 警署強姦, 而家仲日光日白眾目睽睽下非禮

【訓撚醒未呀】港共政府 無辦法係機場清場 但 可以 連登分化粉碎呢個活動
https://lih.kg/1467822
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

試下用 我不會放棄機場 回覆

另外

First, we are sorry for those affected tourists or citizen.
Sorry Sorry Sorry.

Please forgive our immature behaviour in 12/8. We are sorry that our mind was in the decisive point of crashed mind. During last coupon of days, Hongkonger are suffered from the sadness of broken eye of a girl, undercover among the protestor and the “responsive” government. Our Government had a speech that Government is willing to talk to the people if the violence stop. However, this is an inverse of the cause and effect. Because Government don’t talk, campaign continued. Until this moment, the movement lasted for more than two months, from day to day, under 32 degrees. Summer, is a season that youngsters go to the beach, have fun in karaoke or travel abroad. They give up all their rights of enjoying those human rights. They protested, and they suffered. Although they are intelligent, they are still human being. Human being will make mistake under high pressure and/or bad mental status, just like you and me.

Thus, we sincerely beg for your forgiveness for any immature behaviour we took.
